import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-portfolio', templateUrl: './portfolio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./portfolio.component.css'] }) export class PortfolioComponent { }

Beekeeping App

This is a beekeeping app that I am currently working on. It is an android app that will allow beekeepers to track their hives and the health of their bees. It will also allow them to track their honey production and the amount of honey they have sold. The app is written in Kotlin and uses the Android Jetpack libraries. It uses Room for the database, LiveData for the data layer, and the Navigation component for navigation. It also uses the Hilt dependency injection library. I am using the clean architecture pattern.
